arStrings.szText: Enemies take {c_number}[{SF_15}*100|%x|]{/c} increased Burning damage from you while standing in {c_important}Firewall{/c}.
Enemies continue Burning for {c_number}{SF_11}{/c} seconds after leaving {c_important}Firewall{/c}.
You gain {c_number}[{SF_16}*100|%x|]{/c} increased Mana Regeneration per active {c_important}Firewall{/c}, up to {c_number}[{SF_16} * {SF_17} * 100|%x|]{/c}.
